name: Fortune (Gav Sarafian)
description:
Fortune is a short first-person level where you have a conversation with a Fortune Teller robot, talk about existential subject matter, and maybe end up with a sweet new toy.

Gameplay video


Features:

  • Branching dialogue
  • Ennui-filled robot NPC
  • Three unique rewards!
  • Entirely self-made assets*

Best played on PC! Download the package below and play from your desktop. The HTML5 version works, but does not feature lighting effects or audio.

Content Warning:
This game contains some flashing lights, and weapons imagery.

Check out my other games here.

*With the exception of music and sound effects from www.zapsplat.com, and base textures from www.textures.com
